data.name: MetaCloneGrid
data.value:
DECLARE @tables table (fldName nvarchar(50)) DECLARE @tablename nvarchar(100) DECLARE @colname nvarchar(100) DECLARE @insertSQL nvarchar(max) DECLARE @colSQL nvarchar(max) DECLARE @valSQL nvarchar(max) DECLARE @gridIdentity int DECLARE @sql nvarchar(max)
INSERT INTO @tables(fldName) values('tblMetaGrid') INSERT INTO @tables(fldName) values('tblMetaGridColumn')
SET @sql = 'DECLARE @insertedGridIdentity int, @clonedGridIdentity int' + CHAR(13)+CHAR(10) SET @sql = @sql + 'BEGIN TRANSACTION ' + CHAR(13)+CHAR(10) DECLARE TableCursor CURSOR FOR SELECT fldName from @tables OPEN TableCursor FETCH NEXT FROM TableCursor INTO @tablename WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS=0 BEGIN SET @colSQL = '' SET @valSQL = ''
DECLARE ColumnCursor CURSOR FOR SELECT name from sys.columns where object_id=object_id(@tablename) and is_identity=0 OPEN ColumnCursor FETCH NEXT FROM ColumnCursor INTO @colname WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS=0 BEGIN SET @colSQL = COALESCE(@colSQL,'') + '[' + @colname + '],'
IF (@tablename='tblMetaGridColumn' AND @colname='fldMetaGridId') SET @valSQL = COALESCE(@valSQL,'') + '@insertedGridIdentity,' ELSE IF (@tablename='tblMetaGrid' AND @colname='fldGridName') SET @valSQL = COALESCE(@valSQL,'') + '''CLONE of '' + [' + @colname + '],' ELSE SET @valSQL = COALESCE(@valSQL,'') + '[' + @colname + '],'
FETCH NEXT FROM ColumnCursor INTO @colname END
IF (@tablename='tblMetaGrid') BEGIN SET @insertSQL = 'INSERT INTO ' + @tablename + ' (' + left(@colSQL,len(@colSQL)-1) + ') SELECT ' + left(@valSQL,len(@valSQL)-1) + ' FROM ' + @tablename + ' WHERE fldId=@clonedGridIdentity; ' + CHAR(13)+ CHAR(10) SET @sql = @sql + @insertSQL SET @sql = @sql + 'SET @insertedGridIdentity = (Select @@Identity);' + CHAR(13)+ CHAR(10) END ELSE BEGIN SET @insertSQL = 'INSERT INTO ' + @tablename + ' (' + left(@colSQL,len(@colSQL)-1) + ') SELECT ' + left(@valSQL,len(@valSQL)-1) + ' FROM ' + @tablename + ' WHERE fldMetaGridId=@clonedGridIdentity; ' + CHAR(13)+ CHAR(10) SET @sql = @sql + @insertSQL END
CLOSE COLUMNCURSOR DEALLOCATE COLUMNCURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM TableCursor INTO @tablename END
SET @sql = @sql + 'COMMIT TRANSACTION'
CLOSE TableCursor DEALLOCATE TableCursor print @sql EXEC sp_executesql @stmt=@sql

data.name: MetaGetCurrencyView
data.value: SELECT tblMetaCurrencyConversionFactor.fldId, tblMetaCurrencyConversionFactor.fldClientCurrencyId, fc.fldCode AS fldFromCode, tc.fldCode AS fldToCode, tblMetaCurrencyConversionFactor.fldExchangeRate FROM tblMetaCurrencyConversionFactor INNER JOIN tblMetaCurrency AS tc ON tblMetaCurrencyConversionFactor.fldCurrencyIdTo = tc.fldId INNER JOIN tblMetaCurrency AS fc ON tblMetaCurrencyConversionFactor.fldCurrencyIdFrom = fc.fldId

data.name: MetaGetLossEstAfterView
data.value: SELECT tblMetaLossEstimate.fldId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldClientCurrencyId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldCurrencyId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldLossEstimateTypeId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldIndexNo, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeText, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeDisplay, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeValueLow, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeValueHigh, tblMetaCurrency.fldCode FROM tblMetaLossEstimate INNER JOIN tblMetaCurrency ON tblMetaLossEstimate.fldCurrencyId = tblMetaCurrency.fldId WHERE fldLossEstimateTypeId=2

data.name: MetaGetLossEstBeforeView
data.value: SELECT tblMetaLossEstimate.fldId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldClientCurrencyId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldCurrencyId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldLossEstimateTypeId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldIndexNo, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeText, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeDisplay, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeValueLow, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeValueHigh, tblMetaCurrency.fldCode FROM tblMetaLossEstimate INNER JOIN tblMetaCurrency ON tblMetaLossEstimate.fldCurrencyId = tblMetaCurrency.fldId WHERE fldLossEstimateTypeId=1

data.name: MetaGetLossEstCostView
data.value: SELECT tblMetaLossEstimate.fldId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldClientCurrencyId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldCurrencyId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldLossEstimateTypeId, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldIndexNo, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeText, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeDisplay, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeValueLow, tblMetaLossEstimate.fldRangeValueHigh, tblMetaCurrency.fldCode FROM tblMetaLossEstimate INNER JOIN tblMetaCurrency ON tblMetaLossEstimate.fldCurrencyId = tblMetaCurrency.fldId WHERE fldLossEstimateTypeId=3

data.name: MetaGetSourceViewQuery
data.value: select * from ( Select g.fldId, v.name as source, m.definition, g.fldGridName as GridName, g.fldGridPageTitle as GridTitle, c.name as field from sys.columns c INNER JOIN SYS.views v ON c.object_id=v.object_id INNER JOIN SYS.sql_modules m ON v.object_id=m.object_id INNER JOIN tblMetaSource s ON s.fldObjectName=v.name INNER JOIN tblMetaGrid g ON g.fldsourceid=s.fldId ) a ORDER BY source
